original_text: And he took one of the royal offspring and made a covenant with him, putting him under oath (the chief men of the land he had taken away),
korean_text: 그 왕족 중에서 하나를 택하여 언약을 세우고 그에게 맹세하게 하고 또 그 땅의 능한 자들을 옮겨 갔나니

sentences.original_text: And he took one of the royal offspring
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 왕족 중 한 사람을 데려갔다

sentences.original_text: and made a covenant with him
the chief men of the land
